# init(frequency:leftEarSensitivity:rightEarSensitivity:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new sensitivity point.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(frequency: HKQuantity, leftEarSensitivity: HKQuantity?, rightEarSensitivity: HKQuantity?) throws
```

## Parameters

- **frequency**: The frequency tested. This object uses [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKUnit/hertz()] units.
- **leftEarSensitivity**: The sensitivity of the left ear, measured in attenuated dB from a baseline of 0 db. This object uses [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKUnit/decibelHearingLevel()] units.
- **rightEarSensitivity**: The sensitivity of the right ear, measured in attenuated dB from a baseline of 0 db. This object uses [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKUnit/decibelHearingLevel()] units.
title: init(frequency:leftEarSensitivity:rightEarSensitivity:)
